prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with ethereal white robes and a green aura around its head.
Imagine a graceful Pokemon that can manipulate time and space with its elegant movements.
Show me a mystical creature that embodies elegance and power with a flowing dress-like body.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon that combines grace with psychic abilities, featuring a beautiful design.
Make a Pokemon that uses its psychic powers to protect its allies and calm foes.
Design a creature that thrives in serene environments, radiating peace and tranquility.
Give me a Pokemon that resembles a fairy tale character, with an enchanting presence and charm.

distinctive_features: Green hair with a distinctive head shape
